news.title: U.S. payrolls rise by 228,000 in March, but unemployment rate increases to 4.2%
news.summary: Nonfarm payrolls are expected to grow by 140,000 in March. The unemployment rate is expected to hold steady at 4.1%.

news.title: Traders betting Fed will cut rates at least 4 times this year to bail out economy
news.summary: The CME Group shows raised odds the federal funds rate will fall to 3.00%, down from 4.25% to 4.50% where it is currently.

news.title: Mortgage rates sink on tariffs, but housing costs are still near a record high
news.summary: Mortgage rates fell sharply Thursday, following the Trump administration's tariff announcement. But a huge share of Americans still can't afford to buy a home.

news.title: 10-year Treasury yield falls sharply, dropping below 4%, on fear trade war will lead to recession
news.summary: U.S. Treasury yields continued to plummet as investors digested the aftermath of President Donald Trump's aggressive "reciprocal tariff" policy rollout.

news.title: Price hikes, layoffs and import fees: How car giants are reacting to Trumpâ€™s tariffs
news.summary: Shares of some of the world's biggest car brands traded sharply lower on Friday. Shares extended steep losses from the previous session, extending steep losses.
